unnormalised: **Social Media & Influencer Marketing: Are Your Followers Just "Liking" or *Listening*?**
normalised: social media and influencer marketing: are your followers just "liking" or *listening*?

unnormalised: Been noticing dips in engagement, yaar? Turns out, follower analytics are the new chai time gossip among influencers and brands alike! Understanding who's *really* following you – beyond just the likes – is crucial, especially after Instagram's latest algorithm tweak on 10/10/2024.
normalised: been noticing dips in engagement, yaar? turns out, follower analytics are the new chai time gossip among influencers and brands alike! understanding who's *really* following you – beyond just the likes – is crucial, especially after instagram's latest algorithm tweak on tenth october two thousand and twenty four.

unnormalised: Are your followers from Mumbai actually interested in your Delhi food reviews? Or are they just bots inflating your numbers for that next collaboration with Lakme on 05/11/2024? Analytics can help you filter the noise.
normalised: are your followers from mumbai actually interested in your delhi food reviews? or are they just bots inflating your numbers for that next collaboration with lakme on fifth november two thousand and twenty four? analytics can help you filter the noise.

unnormalised: Platforms like SocialBench and even good ol' Google Analytics (hooked up correctly, of course!) can give you insights into demographics, interests, and activity patterns. This helps you create more relevant content, attract the right audience, and ultimately, boost your ROI. Remember that Diwali campaign that flopped last year? Proper follower analytics could have saved you from that heartache! Time to get serious before the 6 PM deadline for that brand proposal. Think beyond the pretty pictures - it's data that drives real influence, especially when targeting Tier 2 cities like Patna. So, ditch the guesswork and start analyzing!
